thread.title: Enough is enough: Referee suspended for ending game at 31-0 before time
thread.title_full: Enough is enough: Referee suspended for ending game at 31-0 before time

title: Enough is enough: Referee suspended for ending game at 31-0 before time
text:
18:55 CET Enough is enough: Referee suspended for ending game at 31-0 before time - www.allsports.com.gh 
An Italian referee has been suspended for ending a game before regulation time despite the score line being 31-0. 
Persiceto 85 scored the their 31st goal under the half hour mark in the U14 game against Ponte Ronca and the match day official thought enough was enough ending proceedings before the 90 minutes were exhausted. 
The referee who consulted officials of both teams before the decision to end the game has however been sanctioned by theBolognese Football Association as a way for him to do better in the future. 
The AIA say the suspension is not a punishment to the referee. 
'We understand his decision, but the rules must be followed. 
'This suspension is not a punishment, but it is intended as a stimulus for him to do better in future. 
'It's a break for reflection which will be useful for him to grow.' 
Persiceto 85 will also not go down well with the decision as the AIA also ruled that the match be replayed. 31 goals down the drain, huh? Follow @kboakye92 
For more sports news visit allSports.com.gh
